Step.Name: Resolve Trunk
Step.SubStep: SELECT A.RegistryID as RegistryIDOther, A.BERID as BERIDOther, T.TrunkID AS InTrunkID, T.TrunkTypeID AS InTrunkTypeID, T.SuperTrunkID AS InCommercialTrunkID FROM wtbECRTemp A INNER JOIN wtbTrunk T ON A.InTrunkName = T.CDRMatch WHERE T.DirectionID IN (3, 2) AND ProcessInbound IS NULL

SELECT A.RegistryID as RegistryIDOther, A.BERID as BERIDOther, T.TrunkID AS OutTrunkID, T.TrunkTypeID AS OutTrunkTypeID, T.SuperTrunkID AS OutCommercialTrunkID FROM wtbECRTemp A INNER JOIN wtbTrunk T ON A.OutTrunkName = T.CDRMatch WHERE T.DirectionID IN (3, 1) AND ProcessOutbound IS NULL

SELECT A.RegistryID as RegistryIDOther, A.BERID as BERIDOther, T.TrunkID AS InTrunkID, T.TrunkTypeID AS InTrunkTypeID, T.SuperTrunkID AS InCommercialTrunkID FROM wtbECRTemp A INNER JOIN wtbTrunk T ON A.InTrunkName = T.CDRMatch AND A.InSwitchID = T.SwitchID WHERE T.DirectionID IN (3, 2) AND ProcessInbound IS NULL

SELECT A.RegistryID as RegistryIDOther, A.BERID as BERIDOther, T.TrunkID AS OutTrunkID, T.TrunkTypeID AS OutTrunkTypeID, T.SuperTrunkID AS OutCommercialTrunkID FROM wtbECRTemp A INNER JOIN wtbTrunk T ON A.OutTrunkName = T.CDRMatch AND A.OutSwitchID = T.SwitchID WHERE T.DirectionID IN (3, 1) AND ProcessOutbound IS NULL

SELECT InSwitchID, InTrunkName, InternalOutTrunkName, InternalInTrunkName, OutTrunkName, OutSwitch, CallingNumber, OriginalCalledNumber, CalledNumber, CallType, CallDate, CallHour, CallMinute, CallSecond, CallDuration, CircuitDuration, Answered, Seized, FaultCode, RingBusy, UserBusy, TerminalReject, SeqNum, RegistryID, BERID, InSwitchID, OutSwitchID, PartitionID, CallTypeID, CDRDirectionID, tmpOtherNumber11, tmpOtherNumber12, tmpOtherNumber13, tmpOtherNumber14, tmpOtherNumber15, tmpOtherNumber16, tmpOtherNumber17, tmpOtherNumber18, InSettlementDate, OutSettlementDate, CustomFieldD3, MDD, MNPDestinationID, MNPDialCode, ProcessInbound, NPANXXDialCode, UnRoundedCallDuration, InAccountingCountryID, OutAccountingCountryID, InSettlementDD, OutSettlementDD, InAccountingSettlementDD, OutAccountingSettlementDD, ProcessOutbound, InCompatibility70Flag, OutCompatibility70Flag, OriginCountryID, tmpCallingNumber1, tmpCallingNumber2, tmpCallingNumber3, tmpCallingNumber4, tmpCallingNumber5, tmpCallingNumber6, tmpCallingNumber7, tmpCallingNumber8, tmpCallingNumber9, tmpCallingNumber10, tmpCallingNumber11, tmpCallingNumber12, tmpCallingNumber13, OutGPDestinationID2, OutGPDestinationID3, OutGPDestinationID4, InGPContractID1, InGPContractID2, InGPContractID3, InGPContractID4, OutGPContractID1, OutGPContractID2, OutGPContractID3, OutGPContractID4, InIsOriginBasedRating, OutIsOriginBasedRating FROM wtbECRTemp

SELECT InSwitchID, InTrunkName, InternalOutTrunkName, InternalInTrunkName, OutTrunkName, OutSwitch, CallingNumber, OriginalCalledNumber, CalledNumber, CallType, CallDate, CallHour, CallMinute, CallSecond, CallDuration, CircuitDuration, Answered, Seized, FaultCode, RingBusy, UserBusy, TerminalReject, SeqNum, RegistryID, BERID, InSwitchID, OutSwitchID, PartitionID, CallTypeID, CDRDirectionID, tmpOtherNumber11, tmpOtherNumber12, tmpOtherNumber13, tmpOtherNumber14, tmpOtherNumber15, tmpOtherNumber16, tmpOtherNumber17, tmpOtherNumber18, InSettlementDate, OutSettlementDate, InSettlementDateTime, OutSettlementDateTime, InSettlementTimeZoneShift, OutSettlementTimeZoneShift, InUNPID, InAccountingNumberPlanID, InAccountingDestinationID, InAccountingEventCaseID, InContractID, InisOperationalFTR, InisAccountingFTR, InisMissingFTR, OutUNPID, OutAccountingNumberPlanID, OutAccountingDestinationID, OutAccountingEventCaseID, OutContractID, OutisOperationalFTR, OutisAccountingFTR, OutisMissingFTR, InAccountingContractID, OutAccountingContractID, InAccountingCallCharID, OutAccountingCallCharID, InAccountingServiceID, OutAccountingServiceID, InAccountingSettlementDD, OutAccountingSettlementDD, ProcessOutbound, InCompatibility70Flag, OutCompatibility70Flag, OriginCountryID, tmpCallingNumber1, tmpCallingNumber2, tmpCallingNumber3, tmpCallingNumber4, tmpCallingNumber5, tmpCallingNumber6, tmpCallingNumber7, tmpCallingNumber8, tmpCallingNumber9, tmpCallingNumber10, tmpCallingNumber11, tmpCallingNumber12, tmpCallingNumber13, tmpCallingNumber14, tmpCallingNumber15, tmpCallingNumber16, tmpCallingNumber17, tmpCallingNumber18, InGPDestinationID1, InGPDestinationID2, InGPDestinationID3, InGPDestinationID4, OutGPDestinationID1, OutGPDestinationID2, OutGPDestinationID3, OutGPDestinationID4, InGPContractID1, InGPContractID2, InGPContractID3, InGPContractID4, OutGPContractID1, OutGPContractID2, OutGPContractID3, OutGPContractID4, InIsOriginBasedRating, OutIsOriginBasedRating, ecrIn.InTrunkID, ecrIn.InTrunkTypeID, ecrIn.InCommercialTrunkID, ecrOut.OutTrunkID, ecrOut.OutTrunkTypeID, ecrOut.OutCommercialTrunkID FROM ECR m join ecrs_in ecrIn on m.RegistryID = ecrIn.RegistryIDOther and m.BERID = ecrIn.BERIDOther join ecrs_out ecrOut on m.RegistryID = ecrOut.RegistryIDOther and m.BERID = ecrOut.BERIDOther

Step.Name: Resolve Agreement
Step.SubStep: SELECT A.RegistryID as RegistryIDOther, A.BERID as BERIDOther, P.AgreementPOIID AS InAgreementPOIID,P.AgreementID as InAgreementID,P.AccountID as InAccountID FROM wtbECRTemp A INNER JOIN wtbAgreementPOI P ON A.InCommercialTrunkID = P.TrunkID WHERE P.POIDirectionID IN (2,3) AND ProcessInbound IS NULL

SELECT A.RegistryID as RegistryIDOther, A.BERID as BERIDOther, P.AgreementPOIID as OutAgreementPOIID,P.AgreementID as OutAgreementID,P.AccountID as OutAccountID FROM wtbECRTemp A INNER JOIN wtbAgreementPOI P ON A.OutCommercialTrunkID = P.TrunkID WHERE P.POIDirectionID in (1,3) AND ProcessOutbound IS NULL

SELECT RegistryID, InSwitchID, InTrunkName, InternalOutTrunkName, InternalInTrunkName, OutTrunkName, OutSwitch, CallingNumber, OriginalCalledNumber,CalledNumber, CallType, CallDate, CallHour, tmpOtherNumber17,tmpOtherNumber18, InSettlementDate, OutSettlementDate, InSettlementDateTime, OutSettlementDateTime, InSettlementTimeZoneShift, OutSettlementTimeZoneShift, tmpCallingNumber9,tmpCallingNumber10, tmpCallingNumber11, tmpCallingNumber12, tmpCallingNumber13, tmpCallingNumber14, tmpCallingNumber15, tmpCallingNumber16, tmpCallingNumber17, InGPContractID1,InGPContractID2, InGPContractID3, InGPContractID4, OutGPContractID1, OutGPContractID2, OutGPContractID3, OutGPContractID4, InIsOriginBasedRating, OutIsOriginBasedRating,InTrunkID, InTrunkTypeID, InCommercialTrunkID, OutTrunkID, OutTrunkTypeID, OutCommercialTrunkID,ai.InAgreementID, ai.InAccountID, ao.OutAgreementID, ao.OutAccountID FROM wtbECRTemp m JOIN agr_in ai ON m.RegistryID = ai.RegistryIDOther AND m.BERID = ai.BERIDOther JOIN agr_out ao ON m.RegistryID = ao.RegistryIDOther AND m.BERID = ao.BERIDOther
